text: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. Hopefully, they, MSFT employees, are still watching/reading. Iifc, the last ‘Softie’ to reply or post a message in this group was M. Neihaus. Iirc, no longer with MSFT, his ‘Out of Office Hours’ blog/site, imo, is recommended reading. …w
